author: uniq
message:
I like your UI clinic idea.
And I envy the KDE developers for such cool events. In my area, scientific numerical software, sprints are nice, too, but there is no visible effect after two hours.

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: Actually, it's not that easy. After two hours, the only visible changes are drawings on sheets of paper :). It's going to take a bit longer to see those change materialize in the software itself.

author: Jos Poortvliet
message:
Love the booth and artwork. Yes, the sharing part is difficult. But you can just say 'screw it' and just use it - we (in openSUSE) use github which makes it easy to download things individually without having to clone a repo.

Maybe, some day, we'll find (or develop) a better solution, as pretty much all FOSS projects suffer from this.
